price: Mu by’ukuri twashyize iminyururu mu majosi yabo (duhambira amaboko yabo) igeze ku twananwa, ari na yo mpamvu bazaba bararamye.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā fī aʿnāqihim aghlālan fahiya ilā al-adhqāni fahum muq'maḥūna
